content.en: Algorithmic trading: High-frequency trading algorithms, used by firms to execute electronically targeted trading strategies, are the focus of several research questions. These questions explore the benefits and risks of high-frequency trading, the impact on market performance, regulatory concerns, and the vulnerability of algorithmic models to manipulation. The agency of algorithms is attributed to high-frequency trading firms, computer algorithms, fully automated trading algorithms, and proprietary algorithms. The research aims to understand the strategies, practices, and effects of algorithmic trading in financial markets and the role of algorithms in outperforming market indices and reducing drawdowns.
content.da: Algoritmisk handel: Højfrekvens handelsalgoritmer, brugt af virksomheder til at udføre elektronisk målrettede handelsstrategier, er fokus for flere forskningsspørgsmål. Disse spørgsmål undersøger fordelene og risiciene ved højfrekvent handel, indvirkningen på markedsydelse, regulatoriske bekymringer og algoritmiske modellers sårbarhed over for manipulation. Algoritmernes agenthed tilskrives højfrekvens handelsvirksomheder, computeralgoritmer, fuldt automatiserede handelsalgoritmer og proprietære algoritmer. Forskningen sigter mod at forstå strategierne, praksisserne og virkningerne af algoritmisk handel i finansielle markeder samt algoritmernes rolle i at overgå markedsindeks og reducere tab.
